3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Large 1 bedroom 1.5 bathrooms with panoramic city views. Developed by Related, designed by OMA, The Avery is a sculpted glass tower soaring 618' tall into the SF skyline. Starting on the 33rd floor, residences range from 1-3 bedrooms. Residences feature expansive layouts with floor-to-ceiling windows that emphasize grand views of SF Bay, Bay Bridge, & city skyline. Acclaimed Clodagh Design chose warm wood tones & authentic marbles to create stunning custom interiors. Open gourmet kitchens boast premium Miele appliances & spa-inspired bathrooms feature custom dual vanities & marble clad walls. Amenities & services include attended private lobby, 24/7 valet parking, fitness studio, pool, entertainment lounges & more.
Confidential Remarks: Showings by appointment Monday through Friday (10am - 5pm) and Saturday by appointment. 415.228.8900 TheAverySF.com
Directions to Property: Parking available in The Avery Valet garage. Entra

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience the epitome of luxury living with this stunning corner home at The Infinity! With approximately 1,335 square foot (tax records) of spacious living, this 2-bedroom, 2 bathroom gem boasts an open plan kitchen with premium finishes and a curved living room that showcases exciting architecture. Enjoy ample storage - including a walk-in, primary closet - and a convenient office nook, making this home the perfect blend of style and functionality. The north-east exposure of this corner floor plan provides abundant natural light and verdant tree-top views. One car parking, 24x7 door staff and security, 5,000sqft fitness center, heated indoor pool, movie screening room, club lounge for entertaining, conference rooms, and business center make this the ideal SF home!
Confidential Remarks: Inquiries: Alex.Hachiya@sir.com or 415-314-6690. Offers to be on SFAR Purchase Contract. Disclosures available by request. No litigation in the building -- lending is open.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Designed by the renowned Ken Fulk, The Harrison sets a new benchmark for lavish urban living. From kitchens with professional-grade appliances by Bertazzoni and Sub-Zero, to the spa-like primary baths featuring porcelain Herringbone flooring revel in unrivaled style. All homes feature diagonal-planked Siberian Oak floors, polished white slab Carrara marble countertops and unlacquered Waterworks brass fixtures. Residence 32C is a stunning corner home with expansive Bay Bridge and city vista views. This spacious 1,334 Sq.Ft. floorplan is complete with a private 62 Sq.Ft. balcony. Enjoy five-star amenities and services including a Grand Salon lobby staffed 24/7, a concierge, The Pantry with coffee and tea, fitness center, heated pool and spa, and close proximity to San Francisco's most sought-after attractions. The Harrison is over 98% sold. Don't miss this chance to own one of the final new homes with the best views.
Confidential Remarks: Please call The Sales Gallery at 415-721-7788. Ready for immediate closings! Please note that the images shown are of model homes and not the actual residence listed.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This extraordinary two-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bathroom home includes 1,748 square feet of luxurious downtown living. At just over 600 feet in the sky, the north and west facing views from this elegantly appointed home include nearly every city landmark - from the Golden Gate Bridge to the Transamerica Pyramid, Twin Peaks, City Hall, Salesforce Park, and the San Francisco Bay. This one of a kind home includes interiors designed by world renowned Mass Beverly. It features some of the world's finest materials hand-selected from around the globe including French oak hardwood floors, a spa-like primary bath wrapped in Arabescato Corchia marble and a kitchen with Miele and Sub-Zero appliances. Beyond exceptional privacy and unrivaled views, 181 Fremont boasts 5-star services, world-class art program, private full-floor Residents' Club with a 360-degree open-air terrace, skybridge access to Salesforce Park, and more.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Metropolitan residence 1802 is a corner view home, that sits high up in the south tower and enjoys panoramic views of the city and bay and a peek at the Bay Bridge. The residence features floor to ceiling windows, on two walls, in an open concept living, dining and kitchen area. The chef's kitchen is finished with Viking and Bosch appliances. All rooms enjoy views. Upgrades include hardwood flooring throughout, new ceramic tile flooring and more. 1 Self Parking spot and additional large storage unit is included. The Metropolitan is a full service highrise community with lifestyle amenities that include: a 24/7 front desk with lobby attendants, a 3500+ state of the art fitness center, an indoor pool center with sauna, hot tub and showers, a fully equipped club room with double sided fireplace and catering kitchen, a theater with HD viewing, a business center, a conference room and a roof top terrace with BBQ. The Metropolitan is Built on Bedrock. Live walking distance to the the Embarcadero, the Ferry Building, cafes, coffee shops, restaurants, Oracle Park, Chase Center, Whole Foods, the Financial District, Union Square and more. Live on Rincon Hill and Live it Up in the East Cut, San Francisco's newest and most vibrant neighborhood. Walk Score = 94 and Transit Score = 100.
Confidential Remarks: Please use current SFAR purchase agreement. Escrow is open with Michael Yip/Chicago Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 15 Guy Place is a 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath 1,870 sqft custom new construction condominium residence in a boutique two residence townhouse located amongst San Francisco's most prestigious luxury towers and residences. The home is set in SF's 150 year old Rincon Hill neighborhood, one of The City's Original Seven hills along with its famous neighbors, Nob Hill and Russian Hill. The two level residence is set on the 2nd and 3rd floors of the new construction building just steps form some of the City's most well known attractions. The second floor primary suite has a private terrace and large primary suite with soaking tub and double shower. The custom kitchen is wrapped in Calacatta Italian marble and is a perfect pairing with the homes white oak floors.
Confidential Remarks: Escrow with Rita Lin at ORTC. Shown by appointment, please call for more information.
Directions to Property: Folsom to 1st Street, right on Guy Place.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Discover urban elegance at The Lumina with this 1-bed, 1-bath gem with great view. The kitchen is a culinary masterpiece with fine cabinetry and Gaggenau appliances. The living/dining area is bright and spacious. The primary bedroom is roomy with a spa-like bathroom. Enjoy Bosch washer & dryer convenience and included valet parking. The Lumina boasts a 5-star gym, spa, lap pool and game room, a 24-hour doorman, rooftop terrace, music room, lounge, screening room, and on-site Woodlands Market. Transbay Terminal & Salesforce Park are 1.5 blocks away, with the Embarcadero just two blocks. Access iconic sites like the Embarcadero waterfront, Ferry Building, Financial District, SF Giants Ballpark, and the Warriors' arena. Gourmet dining and cafes are a stroll away. This property suits your luxury residence or smart investment needs. Don't miss owning a piece of SF's sought-after neighborhood.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Residence 5B at The Infinity is the largest floorplan available and boasts peekaboo water views. This dual primary suite (plus den/third bedroom), two-and-a-half-bathroom designer home is finished with custom built-ins throughout, modern lighting fixtures, teak hardwood floors, custom window treatments, Bosch & Thermador appliances as well as custom sliding partitions to close/open kitchen & den. The home is open, airy, and bright and set on the corner of the building with a two walk out terraces with water views. The full-service building hosts a fitness center, pool, 24-hour attendant and maintenance as well as four elevators for convenience and ease of living. Ideal parking space included.

Remarks: Rare opportunity to own a signature waterfront corner home with unsurpassed Bay views to Pier 14, the Bay Bridge, Treasure Island & beautiful sunrises from nearly 60 feet of water frontage. The waterfront is truly yours. The spacious interiors include an impressive great room with an open kitchen with a marble island. The primary bedroom is separate from guest bedrooms with direct bay views & a primary bathroom designed to rival any 5-star hotel. One Steuart Lane is a boutique collection of superlative condominium residences located at the corner of Steuart Lane & the Embarcadero, this once-in-a-generation opportunity affords a waterfront lifestyle rarely available. Designed by world-renowned architects Skidmore, Ownings & Merrill, designed as a timeless connection between the city & the water. Amenities include valet parking, attended lobby, lounge w/full kitchen & waterfront terrace, Wellness Center w/complete fitness & spa facilities including steam, sauna & outdoor hot spa.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Introducing the last opportunity to own a coveted D floor plan at 181 Fremont - Residence 65D. This remarkable 2-bedroom, 2-bath sanctuary is nestled in the heart of the city's skyline, commanding attention from its prestigious corner spot. Admire sweeping vistas of the Bay Bridge, city lights, and lush greenery of Salesforce Park through floor-to-ceiling windows. Spanning 1,555 square feet, this home epitomizes luxury living with meticulous craftsmanship and premium materials. Indulge in the gourmet kitchen outfitted with Miele and Sub-Zero appliances, while French oak floors exude warmth and sophistication. Gorgeous, full slabs of Arabescato Corchia adorn the walls in the primary bath, elevating the aesthetic to unparalleled heights. Beyond the allure of privacy and unrivaled views, 181 Fremont sets a new standard for luxury living with 5-star services, a world-class art program, and an exclusive Residents' Club. Enjoy the 360-degree open-air terrace, fireside gathering area, inviting lounges, and state-of-the-art fitness center with a yoga studio. Notably, 181 Fremont offers direct access to Salesforce Park, a sprawling 5.4-acre oasis at your doorstep. Please note that the visuals provided are from a similar residence on a lower floor.

This bright Plaza unit w/10' ceilings has a quiet and serene view of the greenbelt and a peek-a-boo view of Folsom and the SF skyline from the large windows in the living room. Pristine, light hardwood floors throughout, upgraded chef-grade Gaggenau appliances, gas oven/cooktop, in-unit washer-dryer in an extra deep closet, spa-like bathrooms and parking. Up two floors you will enjoy amazing views from the roof deck while BBQing and lounging.
